title-group.article-title: Flight Control System Advances for Near-Future Military Aircraft

abstract.p: Advanced flight control concepts are expected to result in major design changes to the total vehicle configuration and to significantly improve the total mission effectiveness of nearfuture military aircraft. Fly-by-wire controls have been the catalyst that makes these advancements possible. Realistic appraisal of the current state-of-the-art in analog fly-by-wire controls and the major thrust to develop digital controls are presented.
